settings.text: The Delforno Trade Store is a dedicated store stocking all the essential fixing and finishing products for trade and installation professionals. We stock all of the below & much more:

• Adhesives
  • Levelling Clips and Spacers
  • Grouts: Regular and Epoxy
  • Expansion Joints
  • Levelling Compounds
  • Stair Profiles
  • Anti Crack Matting
  • Trims and Transition Profiles
  • Step Edges
  • Tiling Tools
  • Waterproofing Tanking Systems
  • Tile Cutters
  • Tanking Kits
  • Accessories
  • Primers
  • Liquid Dpm
  • Coloured Grouts
  • Silicones
  • Edge Profiles
  • Wood Maintenance Products
  • Outdoor Tile Pedestals
  • Wood / Laminate Underlay

Sign up today to become a Trade Store member and enjoy all the membership benefits listed below.
Contact us for more information on (021) 432 1254 / (01) 525 6868 or email trade@delforno.ie

settings.title: Trade Store Member Benefits
settings.content:
• Trade prices for trade professionals
  • Exclusive access to special discounts
  • Knowledgeable staff
  • Express trade store service
  • Wide range of products in stock
